Posts.Content: I too have been on Arimidex for about 2 years. I sometimes feel tired also but my problem is weight gain and I don't like it. I've always maintained my weight until i came off the chemo and started Arimidex. Even dieting I don't see weigh loss. How could I wheni'm taking something that makes me gain? I'm very discouraged!
Posts.Title: Side Effects of Arimidex After Almost 2 Years
